participant_1.background:
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
I maintained a healthy lifestyle and did well in my classes last year.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.
I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
I like to drive my Honda around, but I have to be careful not to get stung by bees.

participant_2.background:
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
I own a computer that is suitable for my needs.
i am twenty five years old.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking forward to talking to you!
Hi, nice to meet you too!
What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to cook, especially for my family and friends.
That's great! I'm a chef myself and love coming up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
Oh my gosh, that's amazing! I love kale, but I don't know how to use it in a lot of dishes.
Well, I have a few recipes that I could share with you if you'd like.
That would be awesome! I'd love to try them out.
Great! I'll send you a link to my favorite kale recipes.
Thank you! I really appreciate it.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also love to go on vacation and travel to new places.
That's awesome! I love to travel too. I just took a trip to Europe last year and it was amazing.
Oh my gosh, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should definitely go! It's an incredible experience.
I will for sure! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
